attributes.action: HELP WITH CHILDCARE COSTS EVEN IF FAMILY MEMBER DOING IT. WE PAY THEM TOO!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If we send our child to a stranger at a nursery we can get 80% of the cost of childcare back. However if my mum cares for our child we get nothing. We still pay our family to do this. How is this fair? Its not worth working!!

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
